projects.title: Semantically Segmenting 3D Meshes Using Graph Convolutional Networks.

caption.en: This blog will address the semantic segmentation 3D meshes provided by the COSEG dataset by using graph convolutional networks.

projects.title: Graph Convolutional Networks: A Theoretical Deep Dive.

caption.en: Blogs delves into the structure, underlying principles, and forward propagation rule of graph convolutional networks.
